## About

I‚Äôm a **Full Stack Developer** with a strong focus on **backend engineering** and **software architecture**, with a domain-first mindset and a preference for clear, explicit technical decisions.

I hold a **Technology degree in Systems Analysis and Development** and I‚Äôm currently pursuing a **Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Software Engineering**. My first professional experience as a Web Developer was in **2020‚Äì2021** at an education institution, where I worked on a **Moodle-based remote learning platform** and built custom web interfaces to support teachers and students.

More recently, I‚Äôve been delivering projects with **PHP 8.4 / Laravel 12**, **MySQL**, and **React + TypeScript**. I shipped an **Attendance & Mentorship system** for an education team that stayed in use beyond the initial release, and I continue to maintain and extend it in a private codebase based on real operational needs. I also built **Portfolio Studio**, a modular **Laravel + Inertia + React** codebase for a **content-managed public site**, structured as a modular monolith with clear module boundaries, section-based templates, localization, shared image attachments, and a capabilities layer to keep modules decoupled.

I‚Äôm particularly interested in **backend design** and **evolution over time**. I work with **RESTful APIs** and **modular monoliths**, applying ideas from **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** and **Clean Architecture** pragmatically, backed by **SOLID**, design patterns, and clean code practices‚Äîusing **Git** and **Docker** as part of my daily workflow.

---

## Now

- üîç Open to **backend or full stack roles** using PHP/Laravel and modern frontend (React/TypeScript)
- üß© Interested in teams that value **architecture, domain modeling and code quality**
- üöÄ Currently exploring **microservices**, **system integration** and **cloud patterns** to apply in a **future SaaS product**

---

## Tech Stack

### Core

- **Backend:** PHP 8.4, Laravel 12, REST APIs, OAuth 2.0, modular monoliths, CQRS and domain events (specific use cases)
- **Frontend:** React.js, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js
- **Database:** MySQL (relational modeling, constraints, migrations)
- **Tooling:** Docker, Git/GitHub, VS Code

### Additional Experience

- **Backend:** C#, .NET 9, ASP.NET Core
- **Frontend:** Next.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- **Database:** SQL Server, PostgreSQL

---

## How I Work

- **Domain first** ‚Äì start from domain language and business rules to define modules and use cases
- **Modular monolith by default** ‚Äì clear boundaries before considering microservices
- **Patterns with a purpose** ‚Äì CQRS, events and repositories applied only when they solve real problems
- **Maintainable code** ‚Äì readability, clear responsibilities and refactoring paths as part of the workflow
- **Professional Git workflow** ‚Äì branches, focused commits and review-like changes, even when working solo
- **Reproducible environments** ‚Äì Docker for local environments closer to production

---

## Highlighted Projects

### Portfolio Studio

Modular Laravel 12 + Inertia + React studio for building a content-managed public portfolio site and an admin dashboard.

- **Stack:** PHP 8.2+, Laravel 12, Inertia, React + TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, MySQL
- **Modular monolith architecture:** modules under `app/Modules/*`, with module routes and providers for clear boundaries
- **CMS-style public pages:** pages composed from section templates and module-provided section components
- **Cross-module ‚Äúcapabilities‚Äù layer:** stable capability keys used as an in-process mediator to reduce direct coupling between modules
- **Localization model:** public vs system locale cookies, multi-locale entities with per-record translations and optional locale swap flow
- **Shared image attachments:** reusable morph pivot (`image_attachments`) to attach images across different modules
- **CI/CD-ready workflows:** GitHub Actions for backend optimization and frontend build/deploy paths

üîó **Live site:** [devfelipert.com.br](https://devfelipert.com.br)  
üì¶ **Repository:** [portfolio-studio](https://github.com/DevFelipeRT/portfolio-studio)

### Attendance & Mentorship MVP

Browser-only Laravel MVP for education teams to manage classroom attendance and 1:1 mentorship workflows.

- **Stack:** PHP 8.2+, Laravel 12, MySQL/SQLite, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, PHPUnit
- Manage core data: **students**, **teachers/mentors** and **subjects**
- Create class groups, enroll students, generate lessons and record attendance (including single-student groups)
- Manage 1:1 mentorships with scheduled sessions and **credit-based billing**
- UI-only system (no public HTTP API), focused on classroom and mentorship operations
- Documentation covering **domain**, **architecture**, **local setup**, common tasks and troubleshooting

üì¶ **Repository:** [attendance](https://github.com/DevFelipeRT/attendance)

### Well-Being Check-Ins

Laravel 12 + MySQL MVP for tracking daily well-being with dashboards and a production demo mode.

- **Stack:** PHP 8.2+, Laravel 12, MySQL 8, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js
- Daily check-ins with a **one-per-day rule** and optional notes
- Dashboard with **7-day, 30-day and current month** summaries and trends
- **Demo mode** that auto-creates a temporary user and seeds sample data so hiring managers can explore without registration
- Authentication flows based on **Laravel Breeze**
- Docker-oriented setup instructions and documentation for architecture, local setup and common tasks

üîó **Live demo:** [wellbeing.ezep.com.br](https://wellbeing.ezep.com.br)  
üì¶ **Repository:** [well-being](https://github.com/DevFelipeRT/well-being)
